about_the_game:
(This game was created as both a proof of concept and game design showcase)

Throw Home is a 2D action game designed for players new to video games. Use items in a plethora of ways and get new levels based on how you play! Throwing, spinning, jumping, almost anything ending in "ing" (excludes fracking) can be done with items in Throw Home!

With the all-new Demand system, how you play will choose what's next. Focus on enemies and your next level is a clash in their base! But take it easy, and now you're on a date with one! If you're new to games, this is a great way to experience a variety of gameplay and figure out what fits best for you. If you're not new to games, please take 5 dollars out of the tip jar.

Experience life as a toy no one wants (not even telemarketers). Defeated by his lack of market, he's been hanging in a shop display for some time, many would theorize forever. If only, only, someone out there wanted him. Alas we'll never know. Even if we could see into the future, we would be more focused on lotto numbers and loopholes in day trading. Honestly, we lost our interest in him about 8 words in. But who knows, it might take you 11!
